advice_triggers.condition_script: not BattleType("naval") and not BattleUnitIsPlayers() and BattlePlayerUnitEngagedInMelee()
not BattleType("naval") and not BattleUnitIsPlayers() and BattlePlayerUnitActionStatus("wavering") and BattlePlayerCommanderCanRally()
not BattleType("naval") and BattleUnitIsPlayers() and BattleEnemyUnitActionStatus("wavering")

not BattleType("naval") and BattleUnitIsPlayers() and BattleEnemyUnitActionStatus("reloading") and (BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilitySupported("plug_bayonets") or BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilitySupported("ring_bayonets") or BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilitySupported("socket_bayonets"))
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() == 1 and FactionName("britain") and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() == 1 and FactionName("france") and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() == 1 and FactionName("spain") and not CampaignName("episodic_1")

IsMessageType("disaster_earthquake") or IsMessageType("disaster_eruption") or IsMessageType("disaster_fire") or IsMessageType("disaster_flood") or IsMessageType("disaster_hurricane")

IsMessageType("disease_cholera") or IsMessageType("disease_dengue_fever") or IsMessageType("disease_gripe") or IsMessageType("disease_malaria") or IsMessageType("disease_plague") or IsMessageType("disease_small_pox") or IsMessageType("disease_typhoid_fever") or IsMessageType("disease_typhus") or IsMessageType("disease_yellow_fever")
SlotIsLocal() and (SlotType("sheep") or SlotType("wheat") or SlotType("rice") or SlotType("corn") or SlotType("cattle"))
SlotIsLocal() and (SlotType("iron") or SlotType("silver") or SlotType("gold") or SlotType("gems"))
SlotIsLocal() and (SlotType("southern_usa") or SlotType("caribbean") or SlotType("cuba") or SlotType("egypt") or SlotType("india_highlands") or SlotType("tropical_humid"))
CharacterIsLocalCampaign() and (CharacterType("General") or CharacterType("colonel")) and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
CharacterIsLocalCampaign() and (CharacterType("catholic_missionary") or CharacterType("Protestant_Missionary") or CharacterType("orthodox_missionary"))

not CharacterIsLocalCampaign() and (CharacterType("General") or CharacterType("colonel") or CharacterType("admiral") or CharacterType("captain") or CharacterType("gentleman") or CharacterType("rake") or CharacterType("Eastern_Scholar") or CharacterType("assassin") or CharacterType("catholic_missionary") or CharacterType("Protestant_Missionary") or CharacterType("orthodox_missionary") or CharacterType("middle_east_missionary") or CharacterType("indian_missionary"))
CharacterIsLocalCampaign() and (CharacterType("General") or CharacterType("colonel")) and CharacterTrait("C_General_Night_Fighter")
CharacterIsLocalCampaign() and (CharacterType("gentleman") or CharacterType("rake") or CharacterType("Eastern_Scholar") or CharacterType("assassin"))
SettlementIsLocal() and not IsHomeRegion() and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
SettlementIsLocal() and IsHomeRegion() and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
RegionIsLocal() and not CampaignName("episodic_1") and RegionBrigandsAbound()
FactionIsLocal() and FactionGovernmentType("gov_republic") and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() == 3 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() == 4 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() == 5 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() >= 6 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() >= 6 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() >= 6 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() >= 6 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")

FactionIsLocal() and LosingMoney() and SupportCostsPercentage() > 60 and (FactionTaxLevel("upper_classes") < TaxLevel("tax_extortionate") or FactionTaxLevel("lower_classes") < TaxLevel("tax_extortionate")) and FactionTreasury() > 0
FactionIsLocal() and LosingMoney() and FactionTreasury() <= 0 and UnusedInternationalTradeRoute()

FactionIsLocal() and TurnNumber() >= 6 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
CharacterIsLocalCampaign() and (CharacterInTheatre("East Indies") or CharacterInTheatre("Straits of Madagascar") or CharacterInTheatre("Coast of Brazil") or CharacterInTheatre("Ivory Coast"))

not IsColony() and SlotType("port") and IsBuildingInChain("port-fish")

not IsColony() and SlotType("port") and IsBuildingInChain("port-trade")

SlotIsLocal() and not IsBuildingInChain("army-admin") and not IsBuildingInChain("barracks") and not IsBuildingInChain("navy-admin") and not IsBuildingInChain("ordnance")
RegionIsLocal() and IsColony() and TurnNumber() >= 6 and not CampaignName("episodic_1")
RegionIsLocal() and IsColony() and not TradePortsAtMaxLevel() and RegionHasUnexportedTrade()
RegionIsLocal() and IsColony() and TradePortsAtMaxLevel() and not HasUnspecialisedPort() and not RegionHasUnexportedTrade()
